title: Bard-Skin: Experimental Bard (Name not final)
body:
So in my opinion what makes Bard stand out as a champion is his ability to make portals.

That said, I think it might be pretty interesting to make a Skin for Bard in the style of Valve´s _Portal/Portal2_ 

Here`s my concept:

-Bard himself would have a white armored body similar to those of the turrets in Portal, also    his "eyes" (holes in the mask) would glow red

-For his portals you could color the entrance orange and the exit blue similar to the oprtals the gun itself shoots

-His "health pack" could be a cake as the cake is a frequently mentioned gag in the series

-His projectile would be red similar to the aiming laser the turrets shoot

-And lastly instead of collecting chimes he would have to find companion cubes (little cubes with a heart pattern on its sides)

Now I know it probably won´t be officially released due to copyright issues, but maybe someone somewhere could make a custom skin.


Thanks for reading :D




(This is my first post don´t hate pls)
